models.name: todo_app_configurations
models.description: System-level configuration settings for the Todo application. Stores key-value pairs for application configuration, feature flags, and system metadata that can be referenced by other components. {@link todo_app_users} {@link todo_app_admins} {@link todo_app_todos}

plainFields.name: key
plainFields.description: Unique configuration key identifier. Used to reference specific configuration settings throughout the application.

plainFields.name: value
plainFields.description: Configuration value stored as string. Can represent various data types including boolean flags, numeric values, or JSON configuration objects.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Human-readable description explaining the purpose and usage of this configuration setting.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this configuration was first created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this configuration was last modified.

models.name: todo_app_users
models.description: User account for the Todo application. Represents individual users who can create and manage their personal todo items. {@link todo_app_todos}

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: User's email address for authentication and notifications. Must be unique across all users.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for user authentication. Never store plain passwords.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was soft deleted. Null if active.

models.name: todo_app_admins
models.description: Administrator account for the Todo application. Admins have system-wide access and can perform maintenance operations. {@link todo_app_users}

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the base user account. {@link todo_app_users.id}

plainFields.name: admin_level
plainFields.description: Administrator privilege level (e.g., 'super_admin', 'system_admin').

plainFields.name: permissions
plainFields.description: Comma-separated list of system permissions granted to this admin.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin account was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin account was soft deleted. Null if active.

models.name: todo_app_todos
models.description: Core todo items for personal task management. Stores individual todo tasks with their completion status and timestamps for the single-user Todo application. Users can create, read, update completion status, and delete todo items through basic CRUD operations.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: The text content of the todo item. Limited to 500 characters as per business requirements for task descriptions.

plainFields.name: completed
plainFields.description: Completion status of the todo item. False indicates pending, true indicates completed.

plainFields.name: completed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was marked as completed. Null if not completed yet.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was last modified.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was soft deleted. Null indicates the todo is active.
